title: Who Are the COVID Vaccine 'Holdouts'?
author: MedPage Today
description: Who Are the COVID Vaccine 'Holdouts'? Sean O'Leary ACCORDS
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
cleaned_text: Sean O'Leary, MD, said that in general, parents who are highly motivated to vaccinate themselves are going to vaccinate their children when they're eligible. CU Anschutz CU Medicine Building 13199
